entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow early this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Friday 30 December 2022
